general.name: procGimgLco
general.short: LCO Guide Focus Acquisition Camera (GFA) processed image
general.description: GFAs are used to image stars in the sky to correct telescope pointing and focus during spectrograph exposures.  Headers and HDUs within contain guide star centroiding data and derived telescope measurements and corrections.

releases.name: WORK
releases.description: SDSS unreleased data.  Represents any work-in-progress data.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

hdu1.name: RAW
hdu1.description: bias, dark, flat corrected image frame

header.comment: The image type of the file
Time of the start of the exposure [TAI]
Scale of unbinned pixel on sky [arcsec/pix]
Truss temperature deg C. Used for automatic foc
Units of coordinate increment and value
Units of coordinate increment and value
Method used to solve the field
Time to solve the field or fail
guide rms between reference and solved (mm)
tai seconds at middle of exposure
number of stars used in fit
number of GFAs used in fit
number of iterations for wcs solve
number of iterations for full solve
median measured zeropoint of gaia sources

hdu2.name: CENTROIDS
hdu2.description: centroid measurements for all GFA object detections prior to matching to specific Gaia catalog sources.  Most columns correspond to what is returned by sep.extract (https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html).

thresh.name: thresh
thresh.description: threshold at centroid location (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

npix.name: npix
npix.description: number of pixels belonging to centroid (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

tnpix.name: tnpix
tnpix.description: number of pixels above threshold (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

xmin.name: xmin
xmin.description: min x coord of centroid (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

xmax.name: xmax
xmax.description: max x coord of centroid (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

ymin.name: ymin
ymin.description: min y coord of centroid (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

ymax.name: ymax
ymax.description: max y coord of centroid (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

x.name: x
x.description: x center of centroid (first moment, sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

y.name: y
y.description: y center of centroid (first moment, sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

x2.name: x2
x2.description: x second moment (variance) of centroid (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

y2.name: y2
y2.description: y second moment (variance) of centroid (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

xy.name: xy
xy.description: xy second moment (covariance) of centroid (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

errx2.name: errx2
errx2.description: x second moment error (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

erry2.name: erry2
erry2.description: y second moment error (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

errxy.name: errxy
errxy.description: xy second moment error (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

cflux.name: cflux
cflux.description: sum of member pixels in convolved data (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

flux.name: flux
flux.description: sum of member pixels in unconvolved data (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

cpeak.name: cpeak
cpeak.description: peak value in convolved data (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

peak.name: peak
peak.description: peak value in unconvolved data (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

xcpeak.name: xcpeak
xcpeak.description: x coordinate of convolved peak pixel (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

ycpeak.name: ycpeak
ycpeak.description: y coordinate of convolved peak pixel (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

xpeak.name: xpeak
xpeak.description: x coordinate of unconvolved peak pixel (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

ypeak.name: ypeak
ypeak.description: y coordinate of unconvolved peak pixel (sep extraction output https://sep.readthedocs.io/en/v1.1.x/api/sep.extract.html)

ecc.name: ecc
ecc.description: eccentricity of centroid derived from source extractor a/b parameters

x1.name: x1
x1.description: x centroid position based on gaussian fit to marginal distribution

xstd.name: xstd
xstd.description: x standard deviation of gaussian fit to marginal distribution

xrms.name: xrms
xrms.description: x rms error of gaussian fit to marginal distribution

xfitvalid.name: xfitvalid
xfitvalid.description: 1 if x gaussian fit is valid, 0 otherwise

y1.name: y1
y1.description: y centroid position based on gaussian fit to marginal distribution

ystd.name: ystd
ystd.description: y standard deviation of gaussian fit to marginal distribution

yrms.name: yrms
yrms.description: y rms error of gaussian fit to marginal distribution

yfitvalid.name: yfitvalid
yfitvalid.description: 1 if y gaussian fit is valid, 0 otherwise

aperrad.name: aperrad
aperrad.description: aperture radius used for aperture photometry (input to sep.sum_circle)

valid.name: valid
valid.description: 1 if source detection is valid to use in GFA measurement, 0 otherwise

fwhm.name: fwhm
fwhm.description: measured full width half max of source

camera.name: camera
camera.description: which camera (1-6) source was measured from

fwhm_valid.name: fwhm_valid
fwhm_valid.description: 1 if measured FWHM is good, 0 otherwise

hdu3.name: GFACOORD
hdu3.description: calibration info related to GFA positions in the wok (gfaCoords.csv copied from sdss-v's fps_calibrations package)

xWok.name: xWok
xWok.description: x wok position of GFA center pixel

yWok.name: yWok
yWok.description: y wok position of GFA center pixel

zWok.name: zWok
zWok.description: not used! z wok position of GFA center pixel

ix.name: ix
ix.description: x component of unit vector describing GFA x (pixel) axis in wok coords

iy.name: iy
iy.description: y component of unit vector describing GFA x (pixel) axis in wok coords

iz.name: iz
iz.description: z component of unit vector describing GFA x (pixel) axis in wok coords

jx.name: jx
jx.description: x component of unit vector describing GFA y (pixel) axis in wok coords

jy.name: jy
jy.description: y component of unit vector describing GFA y (pixel) axis in wok coords

jz.name: jz
jz.description: z component of unit vector describing GFA y (pixel) axis in wok coords

kx.name: kx
kx.description: x component of unit vector describing GFA z axis in wok coords

ky.name: ky
ky.description: y component of unit vector describing GFA z axis in wok coords

kz.name: kz
kz.description: z component of unit vector describing GFA z axis in wok coords

hdu4.name: GAIAMATCH
hdu4.description: Contains the subset of CENTROIDS matched to Gaia DR2 sources

xWokMeas.name: xWokMeas
xWokMeas.description: measured x wok location of source

yWokMeas.name: yWokMeas
yWokMeas.description: measured y wok location of source

source_id.name: source_id
source_id.description: Gaia DR2 unique identifier for source

xWokPred.name: xWokPred
xWokPred.description: predicted x wok position of source given measured telescope field center

yWokPred.name: yWokPred
yWokPred.description: predicted y wok position of source given measured telescope field center

xWokPredRef.name: xWokPredRef
xWokPredRef.description: predicted x wok position of source given desired telescope field center

yWokPredRef.name: yWokPredRef
yWokPredRef.description: predicted y wok position of source given desired telescope field center

sdss_r.name: sdss_r
sdss_r.description: SDSS r band magnitude of source converted from Gaia DR2 colors

zp.name: zp
zp.description: Measured SDSS r band zeropoint.  zp = 2.5 * log10(aperflux/exptime) + sdss_r

notes: GFA measurement methods continue to evolve overtime and so proc-gimg files from different dates may not exactly match this datamodel, which was built from an image from MJD 60648.  At somepoint we should reprocess them using the same software version.
